decision_conditions: The submitted report solely addresses the operational and maintenance aspects of mechanical pump stations, omitting a detailed overall Sustainable Drainage Systems (SuDS) design for the site. While attenuation tanks and rainwater harvesting units are indicated on the site layout plan, the submitted report provides no information on their capacity, function, or how they integrate into a holistic SuDS strategy for the site. Additionally, no details are provided for the maintenance or management of these rainwater harvesting units or attenuation tanks. Furthermore, the report lacks essential information regarding design storm periods and intensities, the broader methods for delaying and controlling surface water runoff prior to reaching the pumps, and explicit measures to prevent pollution of receiving waters.
